text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You cannot LIE & WORD SALAD a virus away!!!

What a disgusting, off topic, hate speech! Trump is exploiting the daily Coronavirus Task Force Briefings by using it to send out messages & disinformation to his base. Trump even admitted to it 🙄
